rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall with a foyer that leads to the living areas.
Spacious open-plan area combined with the kitchen and dining, designed for social gatherings.
An integrated modern kitchen within the open-plan living space, adhering to Vastu principles by positioning it in the northeast or east corner.
Adjacent dining area within the open-plan layout.
Primary bedroom with a spacious balcony facing the garden for natural light and calmness.
Secondary bedroom featuring a private balcony oriented towards the sunrise for Vastu compliance.
Third bedroom with a balcony, ensuring ample natural light and ventilation in line with Vastu guidelines.
Main bathroom accessible from the living area or adjacent to bedrooms as per plan layout.

openings.description: Main entrance door on the southern facade with Vastu-compliant positioning.
Large windows in the living area to ensure ample natural light from the east or north as per Vastu.
Windows in the kitchen area ensuring brightness and ventilation.
Bedroom windows strategically placed to allow morning sunlight and fresh air.
Balcony door leading from Bedroom 1 with direct access to the balcony.
Balcony door leading from Bedroom 2 with direct access to the balcony.
Balcony door leading from Bedroom 3 with direct access to the balcony.
